content:
The agency will facilitate Cloudnine Fertility in the sales conversion process. If the client chooses to allocate the entire scope of work for all 5 campaigns, a dedicated manager will be assigned to oversee the process. The manager will regularly call the sales person from Cloudnine to enquire about the status of leads and ensure that the sales process is moving smoothly.

In addition, the agency will provide an IVR (Interactive Voice Response) and call back tracker to ensure proper tracking of leads generated through the campaigns. This will allow the agency and the client to measure the effectiveness of the campaigns and make necessary adjustments to improve their performance.
